meanings.definition: A type of flavonoid found in various plants, especially in tea leaves.
meanings.sent1: Green tea contains catechin, a natural compound that gives it its health benefits.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy drinking tea because it contains catechin, which is good for my health.
meanings.sent3: The catechin in the tea leaves decided to throw a party for all the other antioxidants.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like catechin in the sunlight, full of life and vitality.
meanings.sent5: As I sipped the tea, I could almost taste the catechin working its magic inside me.

meanings.definition: A compound with antioxidant properties that may have health benefits.
meanings.sent1: Doctors recommend consuming foods rich in catechin to boost your antioxidant intake.
meanings.sent2: I believe in the power of catechin to protect my cells from damage.
meanings.sent3: The catechin in the supplement winked at me, promising to keep me healthy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the effects of catechin on my well-being.
meanings.sent5: The catechin in the berries was like a shield, defending my body from harm.
